effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Shield Wall for 4.0 sec and gain Luck of the Draw!, which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.
(4) Set: During Luck of the Draw! Shield Slam's chance to critically strike is increased by 75% and its critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Shield Charge by 12.0 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Skyscorcher Pauldrons
description: For all your radiation dampening needs.

effects.display_string: Set: When your Shield Slam cooldown is reset by Strategist, you gain Expert Strategist, increasing the damage of Shield Slam by 5% and reducing all damage taken by 3% for 6 sec.
(4) Set: Shield Slam critical strikes increase the damage dealt by Thunder Clap and Revenge by 10% for 8 sec.
Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Shield Wall for 4.0 sec and gain Luck of the Draw!, which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.
(4) Set: During Luck of the Draw! Shield Slam's chance to critically strike is increased by 75% and its critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Shield Charge by 12.0 sec.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,362 Parry and 3,102 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 72,666 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: When your Shield Slam cooldown is reset by Strategist, you gain Expert Strategist, increasing the damage of Shield Slam by 5% and reducing all damage taken by 3% for 6 sec.
(4) Set: Shield Slam critical strikes increase the damage dealt by Thunder Clap and Revenge by 10% for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 6,797 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 316,942 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 3,660 Strength and absorbing 1.6 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,210 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...
